original_text: Then Solomon was told, “Adonijah is afraid of King Solomon and is clinging to the horns of the altar. He says, ‘Let King Solomon swear to me today that he will not put his servant to death with the sword.’”
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 솔로몬에게 말하여 이르되 아도니야가 솔로몬 왕을 두려워하여 지금 제단 뿔을 잡고 말하기를 솔로몬 왕이 오늘 칼로 자기 종을 죽이지 않겠다고 내게 맹세하기를 원한다 하나이다

sentences.original_text: Adonijah is afraid of King Solomon
and is clinging to the horns of the altar
Let King Solomon swear to me today
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕이 오늘 내게 맹세하게 하십시오

sentences.original_text: that he will not put his servant to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 종을 죽이지 않을 것이라고
